Author: FawningDeer37

Comment: I love that the title of this article uses the phrase "brain rot." The youngbloods of this generation made the perfect phrase to describe what happened to their parents' brains in the wake of 9/11.   It started small with Colin Powell holding up a vial of white powder to justify a trillion dollar catastrophe, continued to grow through the 2008 crisis and the repression of the Occupy Wall Street protests and the bailing out of the banks who robbed us first, and really took off when MAGA were called "deplorables" and absorbed the moniker, first ironically, then entirely in earnest.   Now they claim their guy was anti-war the whole time and they salivate at the same people who got us into this mess now removing the checks and balances that would stop us from doing it again (and again, and again, even domestically).  Total brain rot.
Author: BarbaGramm

Comment: Even if every nation stayed out of the Middle East, the wars would not end. The people in that region have been killing each other for one reason or another since before the Bronze Age. There has never been a serious long-term peace in the region. Even when one Empire or Caliph gained control, inter-tribal warfare and raiding were common to the point it was basically an institution.   You pull every army and arms deal out of the Middle East and in 5 years all that would change is that they're using spears and knives to kill each other.
